HUBText.Welcome: This is COMET Creations' 1950s medical lab inspired escape room VR experience!
HUBText.Win: Congratulations! We hope you learned a lot about medical labs in the 1950s!

Flask1.Title: Flask
Flask1.Desc: This is a flat bottomed glass flask and it is unknown where it comes from.

Beaker.Title: Beaker
Beaker.Desc: This is a glass griffin low form with pour-out beaker. It was manufactured by Corning Glass Works in the US.
